item.description:
On October 27th, Blues Cafe will bring you another classy night of swing & blues dancing, this time with costumes (if you want)! Since it's the weekend before Halloween, wear your costume if you like! Or, get extra-classied-up -- wear that tux or evening gown you've been waiting for an excuse to wear!

We’ll be dancing to the hot and cool tunes of The Michael Warren Quartet, an awesome Boston-based gypsy jazz band. And, blues dancers, never fear! They’ve got great slow tunes too! Julie Brown will be DJing the band breaks.

New to dancing? As usual, we’ll have a beginner-friendly lesson before the dance, taught by Mike Legett and Dan Rosenthal, also included in the price of admission. No partner or experience necessary : )

We've also got a performance from Jenn Martinez & Julie Brown, plus a fun and silly competition -- a blindfolded Jack & Jill! Sign up for $1 to put your name in a hat. 5 leads and 5 follows will be randomly chosen and randomly assigned a partner. Then you'll dance together blindfolded (one couple at a time, with spotters) to a bit of a song. Audience-judged, winner takes all!

Lesson: 8-9pm
Dancing: 9-12:30am

Regular admission – $18
Students (w/ valid ID) – $15
*Lesson, coffee, tea, water, and snacks/pie are included in the price of admission

http://www.bluescafeboston.com/

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: October Blues Cafe!!!
